products.title: Oslo Blackout Smoke Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This medium smoke blue roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Oslo Blackout Oyster Roller Blind
products.description: Olso is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. The bella blackout oyster roller blind in a lovely whitecolour will suit almost any room. products.title: Thermoblock Blackout Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Their exclusive thermoblock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. A cream roller blind easily brightens up the space. Their thermoblock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This cream blackout roller has a silver uv-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, which means this roller is also great for hot offices or sunrooms.

products.title: Metz Pvc Blackout Cream Roller Blind
products.description: The metz pvc blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, metz fabrics are durable and practical. This neutral cream, marbled, cream blackout roller blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchens.

products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Ivory Roller Blind
products.description: For a soft, subtle addition to any room, isla pvc blackout ivory roller blind has a double sided dreamy leafy design on a light, neutral background that is smart and sophisticated. Flame retardant for safety, the isla features a fabric comprising of blackout material that will keep out the light when you want it to; its a truly high-quality window treatment that will turn heads. Plus, its moisture resistant so you dont have to worry about it getting splashed with water.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Ivory Roller Blind
products.description: Versailles blackout ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish. In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window. Crafted with blackout material, it wont allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with pollergen, this neutralises pollen so it doesnt disturb hayfever sufferers.
